title: Titan CEO spoke of ‘discount’ parts, journalist invited on submersible says
description: Journalist Arnie Weissmann said Stockton Rush spoke in May of getting carbon fiber used to make the Titan submersible “at a big discount from Boeing."

title: GOP lawmakers fear Biden may be preparing to allow TikTok to continue operating in U.S.
description: Language in a new Commerce Department rule hints at an eventual green light for the Chinese-owned app, say Rep. Mike Gallagher and Sen. Marco Rubio.

title: How to find trustworthy repair help for your busted iPhone or TV set
description: Here's advice on how to find a reliable electronics repair shop, what questions you should ask and steps you can take to make sure your repair ends happily.

title: New video undercuts claim Twitter censored pro-Trump views before Jan. 6
description: Twitter employees were told not to take down potentially threatening pro-Trump tweets on the day before rioters stormed the U.S. Capitol.

title: He finished college at 14. Next up: A full-time gig at SpaceX.
description: Kairan Quazi, 14, graduated from Santa Clara University on June 17 and is headed to work as a software engineer in SpaceX's Starlink division.
